alert.note: Alert for Boone County Except Southwest; Boone County Higher Elevations; Eastern, Central, and Southern Searcy County Higher Elevations; Marion; Newton County Higher Elevations; Newton County Lower Elevations; Northwest Searcy County Higher Elevations; Searcy County Lower Elevations (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued June 17 at 6:28AM CDT until June 17 at 9:00AM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM CDT THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Visibility one quarter mile or less in dense fog. * WHERE...Marion, Boone County Except Southwest, Newton County Higher Elevations, Searcy County Lower Elevations, Boone County Higher Elevations, Newton County Lower Elevations, Northwest Searcy County Higher Elevations and Eastern, Central, and Southern Searcy County Higher Elevations Counties. * WHEN...Until 9 AM CDT this morning. * IMPACTS...Hazardous driving conditions due to low visibility.
info.instruction: If driving, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you.
